column1: Kimi wa Boku no Koto o Suuhai Shisugiteiru.
column2: Miyaji’s recent breakup with his girlfriend of three months leads him crying to his best friend, Tomoki, who has been his friend since high school and is a doujinshi artist who likes Momo-tan. Miyaji complains to Tomoki that every girl he has broken up with has the same reason: that Miyaji was bored and didn’t love them. Miyaji begs to differ, and Tomoki agrees that Miyaji is perfect the way he is, which gives the latter feelings he was sure a friend shouldn’t have. As Miyaji figures out what he feels for Tomoki, a drunken night and a heated kiss change everything between the two friends. Will Miyaji be able to come to terms with his newfound feelings?

column2: Official English Translation“Would you let me take control of your nutrition?” College student Sudo is unable to eat other people’s cooking after a traumatic incident. One day, while going to the convenience store he usually frequents, Sudo is handed a homemade bento from a worker at the store he has never seen before. He rejects the offer coldly at first, but opens up after seeing how worried the worker, Hasegawa, is over his health. Around the same time, a rumor starts to spread about a pervert hanging around the university…? column2: Successful career woman Riko Kagami is well-respected at her job by her coworkers and bosses.People even expect her to put off marriage for her career, despite her good looks. Whenever she is not at work, she is fantasizing about hot guys in her head.One day, she bumps into an old classmate, Atsushi Tsuzuki. The former bad boy who often skipped school has grown into a mature adult. They decide to have dinner together, and while they are eating, Atsushi suddenly confesses that he used to have a crush on Riko! column2: Official English: INKR, Azuki“Love isn’t for me.” That is what Tsugumi Koeda, a first-year high school student always told herself. column1: Kimi wa Kon'ya mo shite Kurenai
column2: Asuka is an office lady who is seriously thinking about her future with her boyfriend. Her only complaint about her kind and serious boyfriend, Keito, is that he doesn't give her sex. The place where I was able to fully express my true feelings was at a girls' night out at a bar I frequented. In addition to Asuka, the members of the women's club include Nana, an apparel store clerk who tolerates her high-end boyfriend's cheating and continues to live with her. Miyoko doesn't have a boyfriend and works hard at having sex friends and being a father. Asuka tries to face Keito despite being pushed by the two's values that ``love and sexual desire are different,'' but she ends up having her first one-night stand...!? At a bar late at night. A frank sex talk unfolds. What answer did Asuka find as their respective "sexual values" collided? --Another "don't give me" love that crosses over with the TBS drama "My Pheromone Boyfriend Who Doesn't Give Me" story!

She also wants to have a love where the person you like, likes you back and with this reasoning, Megu is determined to get a boyfriend no matter what.However, her continuous pursuit of love gave her the playgirl impression on men, even the popular playboy Aikawa refused her. column2: It's about a girl named Hatsune with a "bad mouth", for lack of a better description. She's kind-hearted, but her mouth spews the total opposite of what she means (which is probably due to the fact that she grew up with only male influence). And so she is seen as an arrogant, vulgar girl at her school, but all she wants is a boyfriend. Well, that is, until she gets accepted at the Maidens' Club, where she meets a guy named Kirie, with a somewhat unique habit that happens when a girl comes within a foot of him. And everyone says he's gay, even Hatsune. How will these two fare? Will Hatsune have a boyfriend at last? Will he be more than just a friend?

column2: Yosuke Sakura, a novelist who can’t seem to find an audience under his own name, makes a living from the shadows as a ghostwriter. Then out of the blue, he receives a request to ghostwrite the memoirs of the vanished pop idol Haruka Masaki. Sakura gets cold feet when he hears that Masaki requested him personally, wondering what she would want with someone like him. But while he’s thrown for a loop by her uninhibited personality, the distance between them gradually shrinks. However, once the interviews start, the reason Masaki gives for her disappearance paints a portrait of the entertainment business that is darkness itself...?! Official English Translation

column2: Original WebtoonThrown out by his mother, Minoru is sent to live in the countryside. When Minoru arrives, he meets Kou, a classmate and neighbor who shows him warmth and kindness for the first time. However, Minoru soon discovers that Kou is secretly a vampire. Despite being well-loved by the whole village, Kou has been enduring his urges alone this whole time...

column2: From Lovesick Alley:Ito and Chiharu, though seven years apart, both share a very deep friendship in which Ito has an unrequited love for Chiharu. In a turn of events, Chiharu is inflicted with a terminal illness and is put into an induced comatose state in hopes that a cure will be developed while he is sleeping. After seven years, Chiharu wakes up, and finds that Ito is now the same age as him and in the same class.

column2: “He’s annoying, overly familiar, and to be honest, he makes me feel uncomfortable, until I saw that side profile.”Tsuga, who is fed up with the alpha supremacy of the world, has lived his life with a sense of propriety despite his alpha status. One day, however, he sees his least favorite classmate, Matsumae, staring blankly at the river from a bridge. Matsumae who is usually boisterous, was seen with an uncharacteristic side profile by Tsuga, and from then on, Tsuga couldn’t leave him alone?!———The extra is about pairing vows and enraptured lovemaking

column2: Yuki is a high school girl who has been worrying about the way her older boyfriend in university and her are dating. One day, at the end of a terrible date, she accidentally bumped into her class representative. Apparently, he was there to do some stargazing and when she joined him and looked through his telescope, that's when she saw a beautiful world unlike any she's seen before...!While listening to his innocent talk about stars, she can't help but get pulled along. When she realised that it's been a while that she had laughed as heartily as she did then, it got her questioning the way she and her boyfriend are dating even more...This is the heart-swaying and prism-like romance where a new love begins to sprout as another ends.

column2: From Endless Journey:Suddenly my marriage partner appeared...a super hot company president?! What appeared before her eyes was a high education, high income, tall, handsome young company president. column1: Kimi wa Kawaii Koi no Dorei
column2: Official English Translation on RentaIt's weird for brothers to do this...!!Tenya and Yamato Hagiwara were raised as twin brothers, but then they found out the truth. Ever since then, the younger of the two - Yamato - started skipping class and hanging out with the delinquents at school. Tenya takes it upon himself to fix Yamato and make sure he ends up on the right track again, but it's proving to be difficult. One day, Yamato's friend Tatsumi tells Tenya where he can find his brother, but it ends up being a trap as he walks in on his brother going at it! Afterwards, Yamato tells Tenya that he will have to make up for his interruption by being a replacement for the girl who ran off...!!

column2: Official English Translation on Renta28 years old. Still never been with a girl. Because of his big problem, girls refuse to take their relationship a step further!Handsome, nice and smart, but Kaname Kusakabe gets dumped all the time because of his unusually large male organ. He decides to go to counselling. Doctor Minato Momose is extremely sympathetic to Kaname's dilemma. "An impressive specimen, but he's never been with woman!!? I have to help him!" As a doctor, Minato can't help be curious about Kaname's oversized organ. After having it poked and rubbed... Kaname can't help exploding all over the doctor's face. Minato doesn't mind at all, though. He's actually very excited...!Practice love-making at the clinic! An office worker with a big problem and a very dirty doctor!

column2: From Day of the River:No matter how hard or painful it is, I’ve once again, fallen for you…On the day of the junior high entrance ceremony, Hinagata Nazuna fell in love with a second year student, Ichikawa Nao. Unfortunately, her love was short-lived as she discovered that he already had a girlfriend, the basketball club manager. As time passes, Nazuna decides to let go of her unrequited love for him and aims to find a new love interest. However, on the first day of her high school entrance ceremony she unexpectedly comes face to face with the boy who broke her heart years ago….

column2: From MangaHelpers:When the two were still young, Saito and Kawana Subaru were close friends. But with Subaru coming from a wealthy family, she was sent to the top school while Saito had to settle for a regular education.But after painfully studying for years, he was finally accepted as a high school freshman through a scholarship program that only a handful of students are awarded. But what Saito thought was going to be a heartwarming reunion turned out horrible. Subaru had grown up beautiful and was the most popular person in school as she was kind to everyone, all except towards Saito who she seemed to despise.Almost regretting his decision to come to the school, Saito wishes that somehow their dorm rooms would connect to each other. Magically, because it turns out that Subaru wished the same thing, their wish comes true but, in return, Subaru loses her self-control for one hour per day. During that time, her erotic desire for Saito, that she can normally hide, comes pouring out and her true intentions are revealed.He wants to take advantage of this once in a lifetime chance but doing so might jeopardize their relationship during the other 23 hours.

column2: Chiharu Saeki and Wataru Toda are two high school students who share a common hobby. They love to watch movies. After they meet, they become fast friends until one day, their relationship takes a sudden twist. What does it mean to love someone? What can you really do about it? Follow the story of their adolescence and relationship as it unfolds through a brilliant summer.Notes:There are 3 volumes in the series but the second and third volume are under the title of: Kimi to Natsu no Naka of the original releases. The English version published by Kodansha has all 3 volumes under the title My Summer of You, and the digital extras are also included in the English release.Official English Release: Kodansha, Renta

column2: I want to be the main character in a story. I would meet my ideal hero... And have a dramatic love scene like in novels and manga!!...... I wish~Or so Reiko Sengoku thought until a chance encounter with classmate Kanata Hyuuga.

Smart, successful and good-looking Iwaya Sumire works for a big newspaper. However, her boss asks her to leave for being too "perfect" a woman. Feeling angry and dejected Iwaya returns home depressed, and most of all lonely. However, when she finds an unconscious young man lying in a box out the front of her home, she takes him in since he looks like a dog she used to own called Momo. She dubs him Momo and decides to "keep him as a pet." It's the start of an unexpected life together as they overcome obstacles and become quite attached to one another. But can love like this exist?This manga won the 27th Kodansha Manga Award for shoujo in 2003 (shared with Hachimitsu to Clover). Official English

column1: Kimi wa Sekai de Hitori no Omega
column2: "No, I'm in heat!" Sae, a college student, has a crush on Hasumi, a researcher at the same university. Sae didn't intend to convey her feelings to Renmi, a cousin who treats her like an older brother. But one day, something happened to her body! "I want... I want it, I want it." Everything I touched was numb, my body was hot and I was dying trying to control it. And everything was because of the so-called estrus (heat). In front of the appearance of Sae, who was loved like a sister, even a gentle Arasa gentleman has a limit to its reason! A dramatic omegaverse woven by two people having an unrequited love.

column2: Shinichi Tsukasa is a therapist with an edge on the competition; he possesses a unique psychic ability called psycometry. Utilizing this talent Shinichi has managed to counsel many clients and earn himself a stunning success rate. But will his powers be enough to help him with his toughest case yet; recovering the emotions of poet Akio's young nephew Senri.Follow Shinichi as he unravels Akio's twisted past in hopes of finding the cause of Senri's condition. Will he Find the answers he seeks? Can he handle another touch from Akio? And what are these ghostly images he keeps seeing? The answers to all these questions and more are buried deep within the pages of You Get an Angel. Are you brave enough to peek inside?

column2: Louis was born a "magician".Wizards have a very short lifespan, and are despised by the world because they can turn ordinary people into wizards if they come into direct contact with them. column2: “You’re like the wind.”Photographer Suguru comes to Enoshima to take photos when he suddenly spots a young man with hair the colour of the sunset falling into the water. Although they part ways there, they meet again by chance at the shop Suguru stumbles across. column1: Kimi yo Shiru ya Minami no Goku
column2: In 1945, after WWII had ended, many Japanese soldiers had been interned at the P.O.W. camp on "G" island.Lieutenant Tsubaki, a Japanese prisoner-of-war, steals into the infirmary of the U.S. Army, seeking medicine for one of his men, Corporal Mikami, who is suffering from malaria. Lt. Tsubaki is caught and brought before Major Howard, in command of the camp.Maj. Howard forces Lt. Tsubaki to become his plaything, in exchange for the medicine, and Lt. Tsubaki has no choice but to succumb to his cruel games.Lt. Tsubaki is increasingly humiliated in diverse ways by Maj. Howard...When, at last, Lt. Tsubaki manages to save the life of Cpl. Mikami, with the quinine he earns in this degrading fashion, he abruptly breaks off his demeaning servitude to Maj. Howard, only to be attacked and raped by Sergeant Scott and two of his fellow soldiers, who had discovered what the Lieutenant had been doing for the Major.Worse still, a Japanese enlisted man, Private Sonezaki, also interned at the camp, has his enormous respect for Lt. Tsubaki shattered when he, too, discovers his superior officer's shameful secret.Together with other low-ranking Japanese prisoners, they decide to punish the superior officer for what they perceive as his treacherous weakness, by abusing him, sexually.

column2: Photography is the art to grasp beauty with the one and only tool, a camera. Ooji's dream is to become a photographer that photographs at the front lines of war, to take pictures of historical events taking place in front of his eyes. However, his childhood friend, Sumire, doesn't think that he is capable of becoming one.  In his photography club, Ooji shows his photos to the group, and his upperclassman, Ran, points out that Sumire is a good target to photograph. Ooji manages to get permission to take photos of Sumire, and during his shoot, Sumire notices that Ooji is acting differently than before. Later they find out that one of Ooji's pictures won an award! Sumire congratulates him, but Ooji sees beyond his award. He claims that he learned that he has much more potential than he thinks. Ran, overseeing this, plans to take Ooji to the next level so he can capture true beauty through the lens of a camera!

column2: Minato Tada is 28 years old and works for Saki Corporation. Since she was a child, Minato has always taken the role of a mother for her beloved family, but now that she is on her own, her younger siblings tell her, "From now on, I want you to live your own life." Minato, who has always been devoted to her family, is unable to think of anything she wants to do, and the days pass by. One day, she is assigned to be the trainer for Kota Saki, son of her companie's boss who has come to the company as an intern. Minato's life changes drastically when Kota says to her, "I was hoping it would be you..."!

column1: Kimi wa Tsukiyo ni Hikari Kagayaku
column2: Ever since the death of someone important to me, I‚Äôve been living recklessly. After I became a high school student, there was a girl in my class who remained hospitalized due to ‚Äúluminescence disease.‚Äù This disease is named for the fact that the bodies of those who suffer from it glow faintly when exposed to moonlight, and that glow becomes stronger as their time of death draws closer. The girl‚Äôs name is Watarase Mamizu.After learning that she doesn‚Äôt have long to live, and there are things that she wants to do before she dies‚Ä¶‚ÄúWill you let me help you with that?‚Äù‚ÄúReally?‚ÄùAs this promise was made, the time that had frozen for me began moving again ‚Äì

column2: From Batoto Scans:"I'm sorry. If you don’t like it, you should run away now." Nono quit her job after breaking up with her superior at her previous workplace. On the first day of her new job, she got the chief builder's son, Keita, injured. Because of Keita's leg injury, Nono started helping him out. Despite her first impression of his body size and how he looked, Nono was touched by Keita's friendly smile and kindness and was becoming more and more attracted to him. But why does it seem like Keita knew Nono before their first meeting?

column2: When her father whisked her away from her mother, Francesca "Frankie" Vitale was exiled to Sardinia, an island off the coast of ItalyLater, when her dad died, Frankie was stuck with a family she didn't understand, emotionally or linguistically. When they reunite, will their marriage actually start, or will they break their bonds forever?

column1: Kimi wo Shinasenai tame no Storia
column2: In the urban civilization floating in space, "Cocoon", lived four students of the United Nations University: Arata, Tara, Caesar, and Louis. These four were a new breed of human, who had undergone the process of neoteny and adapted to the space age. The entirety of human relationships are decided by contracts, and while some humans get to live for hundreds of years, others are not quite so lucky. One day, these four meet a girl with green hair in the red light district, and thus our story begins.Note: On Aug 16, 2021, a side story volume is out and numbered as vol. 9. Main story ended with its 8th volume. Won the 52nd Seiun SF Awards in Manga Category in 2021.

column2: Ai's heart transplant surgery was successful and she successfully entered high school. On the first day of school, filled with anticipation, Ai met her homeroom teacher, Amane. Although the students are afraid of him, Ai gradually becomes attracted to the teacher's natural and hard-working demeanor. However, there was something that bothered Ai. It turns out that the boy who appears in her dreams after undergoing heart transplant surgery resembles her teacher. Why do I have dreams like this? And who does this "memory" belong to...? A heartbreaking and painful love affair begins.

column2: "Will you take pictures of ghosts for me?" Shouma, whose hobby is photography, meets a person while searching for a photography subject after school. The person, with tears in his beautiful yellow-green eyes, was drawing a picture of someone without a face. Shouma, who couldn't forget him (Ukuhara Akira), visits his class the next day and asks him to become his model. He refuses bluntly, but Shouma, who can't give up, persistently tries to find out more about Akira ...? A curious and lively photographer x A hazel-eyed boy with a closed-off heart.. The clumsy and conflicted youth of immature high school boys.

column2: Working in a bento shop, Arata can't help but be curious about Shun, a young boy who regularly comes to buy food. However, he stops appearing all of sudden. One day, Arata awakes in the other world after saving a dog from drowning in a river. He has to stay in a hotel before passing on – and out of all places, that is where he meets Shun again! A heartful love story about a lethargic guy and a straightforward delinquent that unfolds in the afterlife.Original Pixiv Comic
